name: Parametric Cyber Insurance

description: Coverage for smart contract failures or exploits in blockchain-based systems.

description: Specialized coverage for commercial drone fleets with real-time risk assessment.

description: Insurance for telemedicine equipment and remote patient monitoring devices.

description: Specialized coverage for renewable energy installations with performance guarantees.

name: AI Algorithm Liability
description: Coverage for damages resulting from AI algorithm decisions or failures.

name: Autonomous Vehicle Fleet
description: Insurance solutions for fleets of autonomous or semi-autonomous vehicles.

name: Biotech IP Protection
description: Coverage for intellectual property risks in biotechnology research and development.

name: Digital Asset Custody
description: Insurance for digital assets and cryptocurrencies held in custody services.

description: Tech-enabled coverage for supply chain disruptions with real-time monitoring.

name: Space Tourism Insurance
description: Coverage for commercial space tourism operations and participants.

name: Microinsurance Platforms
description: Digital platforms offering micro-coverage solutions for traditionally underserved populations.

name: Quantum Computing Security
description: Security insurance for quantum computing technologies and quantum-resistant encryptions.

name: Virtual Reality Liability

name: Precision Agriculture

name: 3D Printing Liability
